title: Grenade System Lite
description: Grenade System Lite offers a flexible, user-friendly grenade system for single-player games. Includes low-poly models, FX, sounds, plug-and-play modules and blueprint examples.
longDescription:
Grenade System Lite offers a general-purpose grenade system for single-player games that is flexible, user-friendly, and easily extensible.


Features include a grenade module with adjustable parameters and convenient expansion options, and an explosion module with flexible parameters for quick expansion.


[1.0 Set up and showcase]


My other Asset Packs:

  • [UMG Typewriter Effect Pro]
  • [Grenade System Pro]
  • [Interactive Fireworks Firecrackers Pack]
  • [Ultra Laser Reflection System]
technicalDetails:
For more features, advanced functions, and multiplayer support, consider purchasing the [Pro Version]


Features:

  • Easy to set up and use
  • Suitable for single-player games
  • Includes a complete set of low-poly grenade models, FX, and sounds
  • Main modules are plug-and-play and compatible with almost any pawn or character
  • Grenade module with adjustable parameters and convenient expansion options
  • Explosion module with flexible parameters for quick expansion
  • Includes first-person character blueprint examples
  • Animation blueprint examples with throwing animations
  • Enemy damage and health bar blueprint examples
  • Grenade examples, including frag grenades, molotov cocktails, and C4 sticky time bombs
  • Configurable damage and damage radius
  • Example content can be easily removed


Input: LMB, WASD

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Untested

Network Replicated: No


  • 19 Materials
  • 13 Blueprints
  • 1 Interface
  • 3 Niagara systems
  • 20 Textures
  • 4 Sound effects
  • 1 Animation
